item.title: The Problem of macOS Mojave 10.14
item.description: I’ve been working on a cross-platform SDL2 codebase to get Phoenix up and running, and finally got an OpenGL 4.1 shader to work consistently on my different build boxes just a few days ago. There are a few platform conditionals in my CMake, but the codebase itself is clean. I just updated to macOS Mojave, and everything broke. Emacs stopped redrawing. My Xcode command-line tools were breaking on every build, and my Homebrew installation of LLVM was failing to update to 7.
